body:
Running
```
spack install --test=root gdk-pixbuf
```
results in
```
==> Installing gdk-pixbuf-2.42.2-jfvm7phgbyn7kjfinveosffxomosfan4
==> Warning: Spack will not check SSL certificates. You need to update your Python to enable certificate verification.
==> No binary for gdk-pixbuf-2.42.2-jfvm7phgbyn7kjfinveosffxomosfan4 found: installing from source
==> Fetching https://spack-llnl-mirror.s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/_source-cache/archive/83/83c66a1cfd591d7680c144d2922c5955d38b4db336d7cd3ee109f7bcf9afef15.tar.xz
######################################################################## 100.0%
==> No patches needed for gdk-pixbuf
==> gdk-pixbuf: Executing phase: 'install'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    'ninja' '-j4' 'test'

1 error found in build log:
     293    Fail:               1
     294    Unexpected Pass:    0
     295    Skipped:            0
     296    Timeout:            0
     297
     298    Full log written to /tmp/gitlab-runner/spack-stage/spack-stage-gdk-
            pixbuf-2.42.2-jfvm7phgbyn7kjfinveosffxomosfan4/spack-src/spack-buil
            d/meson-logs/testlog.txt
  >> 299    FAILED: meson-test
     300    /cvmfs/sw.hsf.org/spackages/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-8.3.0/meson-0.
            57.1-tijqgwd57jhvabowrra4raiz527e2gs2/bin/meson test --no-rebuild -
            -print-errorlogs
     301    ninja: build stopped: subcommand failed.

See build log for details:
  /tmp/gitlab-runner/spack-stage/spack-stage-gdk-pixbuf-2.42.2-jfvm7phgbyn7kjfinveosffxomosfan4/spack-build-out.txt

```
title: Test Issue: gdk-pixbuf
